title: Come to Tokyo
lyrics:
[Bruno Mars「Come to Tokyo」歌詞]
[Intro]
一、二、三、四、五、六、七
[Chorus]
Bruno, come to Tokyo
Bruno, come to Tokyo
Bruno, come to Tokyo
Bruno, come to Tokyo
[Bridge]
Seven eight, sold out ありがとう
Bruno Mars live in the Tokyo Dome
Go!
[Chorus]
Bruno 可愛い
Bruno 可愛い
Bruno 可愛い
So 可愛い！
Bruno 可愛い
Bruno 可愛い
Bruno 可愛い
So 可愛い！
So 可愛い！
So 可愛い！

[Outro]
ありがとう Tokyo
